name: penetration-testing
description: Use when planning or conducting authorized penetration tests against web applications, APIs, networks, and mobile apps. Covers pen testing methodologies (OWASP, PTES, OSSTMM), scoping and rules of engagement, tool selection, reporting, and remediation verification.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick

references.title: NIST SP 800-115 Technical Guide to Information Security Testing
